cause.description:
Established in 1997 by Pro Football Hall of Fame member and former Buffalo Bills Quarterback, Jim Kelly, and his wife, Jill, after their infant son, Hunter, was diagnosed with Krabbe Leukodystrophy, an inherited, fatal, nervous system disease.
1. Early Detection is key
cause.mission: raise money to fund research efforts to identify new treatments, therapies, and a cure for Krabbe and other leukodystrophies.
cause.name: Hunter's Hope
